attributes.action: encourage the Holy Synod to look at greater access to churches, despite fears of vandalism and theft.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please can local churches put a sign on every church door, saying where the key can be obtained out of hours, if possible ? Maybe a system of car keys exchange would be appropriate to deter unscrupulous characters ?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
